query: Generate daily investment report for January 15, 2026
summary: Daily investment report for January 15, 2026 generated and reviewed. Markets rallied on TSMC earnings (+35% profit, $52-56B capex plan for 2026) driving semiconductor sector gains. US economic data came in strong: jobless claims fell to 198K, Empire State Manufacturing surged to 7.7, Philly Fed hit 12.6. Geopolitical tensions with Iran eased, sending oil down 3%. Validation identified and corrected data errors (Nikkei 225 level, Treasury yield precision). Critical review rated report as Moderate quality with constructive bias warning - overall favorable market tone may understate risks.
